==========
korrelated
==========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/korrelated.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/korrelated

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/JoyMonteiro/korrelated.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/JoyMonteiro/korrelated

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/korrelated/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://korrelated.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




A package containing python interfaces to some popular correlated-k radiative transfer libraries


* Free software: BSD license
* Documentation: https://korrelated.readthedocs.io.
